Reviews.Title: “Boring Labor Day weekend!”
Reviews.Author: Tishakoala
Reviews.Content: NO POOL ON LABOR DAY WEEKEND! WHAT ARE THEY THINKING? Cook~outs, swimming,tanning,my family thought the place in a nut~shell, was a dead weekend. Nothing but POLICE and DRUG ADDICTS AND DRUNKS WALKING AROUND. We actually went to Old Town down the road for most of LABOR DAY. Let the live~ins have their cook~out and swim in the GREEN MOLDY pool. Maybe next yr.they will be prepared for a V.I.P. Holiday. Sorry guys you flopped.

Reviews.Title: “o.m.g”
Reviews.Author: jdmlover
Reviews.Content: hotel in good spot but has for the room omg I was stayin at goldstar in it's so much better have no micro or frig have roachs bed was messed up had ony one light workin hole in wall...it was not good

Reviews.Title: “Superb No Frills Bargain”
Reviews.Author: JimStarling
Reviews.Content: We paid around £12 per night to stay here. Such a bargain. We had two double beds, en-suite shower room, air conditioning, TV with movie channels and ESPN. Front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. Superb location, just off 192 immediately behind Capones Dinner Show (not very well signposted so just drive around the back of Capone's and you'll see it!). We've stayed in USA (and Orlando area) several times in the past and have paid much more for worse accomodation. Yes, the decor is dated and the furntiture could be a bit more luxurious but at £6 each per night you can't really grumble! A real gem for those on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “Great Room for the Price”
Reviews.Author: sazbuff1
Reviews.Content: Great room for the price, an older motel and no fills, just basic, clean, friendly staff. We stayed for three nights and had minor problem, the wake up service was inoperative, a slight inconvenience, I always carry a travel alarm just in case. Staff were extremely helpful, after checking in, the front desk called and asked if everything was alright with our rooms, that is customer service! We will stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Good basic cheap accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Cretey
Reviews.Content: For $24/night we weren't expecting much...but we were pleasantly surprised. Don't be fooled it is basic accommodation and does not offer breakfast nor shuttles to the nearby attractions. Rooms were a bit smelly (maybe mold?) but beds clean and comfortable. Housekeeping very good and we had no security problems. If you don't have a car, it will be hard to get to the attractions. There is a local bus (56) from outside the hotel to Disney World. For Universal, you need to take a cab which is about $30 each way. V close to Nike Factory store, mini golf, supermarkets so handy for families. In summary, it is basic but for the price, you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: “nasty rooms”
Reviews.Author: kalikarismom
Reviews.Content: this hotel was terrible. i was traveling with two small children and my husband. we got there and the rooms smelled like mold. we had to get a refund and go to a new hotel. it was awful.

Reviews.Title: “Oasis Inn was great!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The staff was very kind and helpful. The rooms were very clean and the pool was great. We will definetly stay there again when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “back for the fourth time !!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Basic no frills motel , accomodation fine if staying on a budget. Excellent location for attractions. Friendly and very helpful staff and management. Uncrowded pool , free doughnuts and coffee , but get them early. Some rooms recently redecorated and refurbished. Watch out for the dodgy plumbing in some rooms. Overall ...We'd go and stay again no problem.
